name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Mania - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: The Digital Deluxe Edition includes: Classic Character Pack, Golden Banana Mode, SEGA Legends Pack, Classic Soundtrack and Customization Pack.

name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl
description:
The largest collection of Nickelodeon characters ever assembled in a fighting game!
Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl brings together your favorite Nickelodeon characters for one bombastic battle. With a power-packed cast of heroes from the top shows within the Nickelodeon universe, face-off with all-stars from SpongeBob Squarepants, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, The Loud House, Aaahh!!!, Real Monsters, Avatar, The Wild Thornberrys, Hey Arnold!, Rugrats, and many more to determine ultimate dominance. With unique move sets and attacks drawn directly from their identifiable personalities, each character has its own style of play enabling endless hours of enjoyable action for Nickelodeon's legion of fans.

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Mania - Anniversary Edition
description:
The Anniversary Edition includes:

- The game with a collectible sleeve
- 10 Exclusive Cosmetic Items
- Reversible Cover
- 40-page Art Book

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Mania
description:
Super Monkey Ball: Banana Mania is a "modern HD remaster" of Super Monkey Ball, Super Monkey Ball 2, and Super Monkey Ball Deluxe.

This bundle was created to celebrate the 20th anniversary of the franchise.

name: Puzzle Bobble 3D: Vacation Odyssey
description: Bursting with the same cheerful energy, adorable characters, and timeless gameplay as its predecessors, Puzzle Bobble 3D: Vacation Odyssey is the next evolution of the classic Japanese action puzzle game franchise—with the immersive fun of 3D!

name: Mist Legacy
description:
Mist Legacy is a MMORPG created by Virtys. The game offer an intricate gameplay system presented in a simple top-view cartographic environment.

Mist Legacy use turn-based combat, skill-based progression and material distribution scheme for crafting.

name: Jett: The Far Shore
description: Jett: The Far Shore invites you on an interstellar expedition to carve out a future for a people haunted by oblivion in this cinematic action adventure. As scout Mei, be the first to deploy to a mythic ocean planet, take the helm of a 'jett' and explore a vast unknown - skim low over waves, roar up pristine coastlines and carve through otherworldly woods. Adapt to an intricate, systemic open world and persevere through adversity alongside an intimate ensemble in this heartfelt story of courage, wonder and regret.

name: Succubus
description: Become a demonic priestess of lust and use her unique skills to take revenge on your enemies. Regain your kingdom making hell tremble under your hooves! Leave no one alive if they won't bend the knee.

name: Vagrus: The Riven Realms
description: Embark on a perilous journey across a realm forsaken by the gods and devastated by an arcane cataclysm. Accompanied by a hardy crew, you must trade, fight, and explore your way to success as the leader of a traveling company in Vagrus, a post-apocalyptic fantasy RPG-strategy hybrid.

name: Hotel Magnate
description: Have you ever wanted to design and manage your own hotel, motel, resort, or tent? With a ridiculous amount of customisation tools to wield, a host of facilities to build, and a wide variety of guests to impress, Hotel Magnate has it all. Let your inner hotel manager shine!

name: BugDive Deluxe Demo Edition
description:
BugDive Deluxe is a game/interactive comic all about finding bugs. Despite being called Demo Edition, this is just BugDive 2!
Featuring 8 bugs across 40 stages, funny Comic Cat, and some other funny things (:

name: Unstackable
description:
When the worst property developer decides to invest on a remote and inaccessible island, you and your tugboat are the only ones who can help and build the most charming housing project.

Pick up the buildings and send them flying on the island so that people can start moving in right away (or not)...

name: Ghost Town
description:
This story game brings a unique and fun twist to choose your own story adventures. you'll love making choices in this interactive story game!
One choice can change everything!
Immerse yourself in a mysterious story where you make the choices and decide the ultimate fate of other people!

name: Old Still Life
description: It contains 11 maps for Doom 2, boom compatible. There are slaughter moments, some basic puzzles and non-linear constructions.

name: Every Grocery Store Has One Product That Binds Everything in a Unified Energy
description: A game about the obligations of working in retail.

name: Probe: A Game Dev Experience
description: Experience the magic of the videogame production cycle. Go behind the scenes and discover how videogames are designed, the programming which underlies them, and the digital art which brings them to life!

name: Dominion: Guilds
description: Guilds is the 8th expansion to Dominion. It adds 13 new Kingdom cards to Dominion. It has coin tokens that you can save to spend later, and cards you can get more out of by paying extra for them.

name: Rocky Rhodes and the Cracked Case
description: Step into the shoes of Detective Rocky Rhodes and solve the mystery of the mysterious relic with the help of your partner Barbara and mentor Sullivan. The truth can be evasive - but for Rocky, he doesn't have a choice.

name: Gimme Money! Neverquaker
description: You seek the treasure of the Neverquaker, don't you?! Well, TOO BAD!. The architect of his tower was drunk, you can barely maneuver in the air while you run and your lighting spell sucks too! At least your robe can sustain enough damage, but... can you climb the tower and get away with... The Gold of the Neverquaker?!

name: 00:00 Zerotime
description: Escape to the Warpgate on the last remaining rescue shuttle before the shock wave reaches you!

name: Pizza Pony
description: Deliver pizzas, like only a horse can.

name: Mother Is Gone
description: Where is Mother?

name: Unsustainable: a god job
description: Be god's intern and keep the world from crashing down in this 'wario ware' inspired game !

name: Tower of unlife
description:
Climb a unstable tower for ludum dare 49.

An Action Platformer where you have to climb the furthest you can in a tower that is kind of.... Unstable.

Time your Jumps, dodge from Saws and some Angry Wizards and overcome the biggest challenge of climbing in dangerous platforms while a tower is Moving.

name: Puzzled Love
description: Puzzled Love is a a point-and-click-and-drag-and-drop game where you will cover pictures with other pictures to uncover the love story layer by layer. Meet Jonathan and Lily, the two troubled hearts who have just moved into a new apartment to start a life together—a life that is full of new hopes and beginnings. Or is it?

name: LoveCrafting
description: A game about conducting an unstable Lovecraftian ritual.

name: Psycho-unstable Journey
description: This game is about traveling by car. Here you have to overcome a long way through rain and lightning.

name: Lizzie's Lucky Potion Shop
description: Play it safe or press your luck to brew up the perfect potion

name: The Lesser Evil
description:
Survive 10 nights, each painstakingly harder as you get to pick a curse for yourself!

21 unique game-wrecking curse cards, extra palettes, and 4 difficulty modes to choose from.

name: Automation of Sorts
description: Automation* of Sorts is a multiplayer action/puzzle game where you try to keep up with the never-ending maintenance of the automated machines in a variety of poorly-optimized sorting facilities.

name: 周松传
description: Sin descripción

name: The Cruise 2
description: Space-Invader styled stress relieving retro top-down shooter, with a little taste of dungeon crawling.

name: Arthurian Legends
description: Arthurian Legends is a medieval first person action game set in the land of Albion during a time of myth and legend. Battle hordes of Saxons, demonic beasts, the undead and worse in thy quest to save Albion from The Masters of the Old Religion.

name: Planet Zoo: North America Animal Pack
description: Introduce eight amazing new animals to your zoo with the North America Animal Pack! Featuring cougars, moose, beavers and more, it brings a diverse assortment of growling, swimming, and cantering additions.

name: Wings of WW2
description: Take to the skies in this 2D depiction of World War 2 in the 1940's. You will be constantly under attack from Enemy war birds hell bent on taking you down.

name: Mission 1985
description: This game is a tribute to the Run "N Gun games (Commando, Ikari Warrior, Heavy Barrel, Guerilla Wars, Mercs...) from the mid 1980's that you could find in arcades or on 16 bit consoles.

name: Maze Mania: The Ultimate 3D Maze Game
description: In the world of Maze Mania, no maze is too difficult. Push your skills to the limit as you navigate around almost impossible mazes.

name: Gobby McGobblenutz Presents: The Questionably Quirky Quiz Show
description: Are you Quirky enough to win The Questionably Quirky Quiz Show with Gobby McGobblenutz, and permanently enter your name into the Hall of Legends for other players around the world to see how incredibly awesome you are?! Well then... What are you waiting for?!

name: Flyland Wars: 2 Not Yours Mine
description: A sci-fi flying person vs. robot battle game. A stolen asteroid on this flyland contains a labyrinthine mine named Not Yours Mine, and may still have murderous minedroids and a security force-- but certainly does have poison-gas-spewing spiderbots. You have to destroy them all!

name: The Warrior of Wisdom
description: Warrior of Wisdom is an action game focusing on boss battles, tough stages. Inspired by retro games from the 80's. With visual, password, difficulty and soundtrack with a special touch for lovers of old games. Fight against different monsters and save the Castle from the fearsome Lord Skul! Especially for retro game lovers. You'll find epic battles with big Bosses, Password at every stage and high difficulty for retro lovers. All this and more awaits you in "Warrior of Wisdom".

name: Tentacles of Submission
description: Horny kraken with lustful tentacles versus anime girls!

name: Room 13
description: You have just checked in to your motel room, 'Room 13'...unlucky you. A sudden knock on your room door, awakens you from your deep sleep and turns out to become your unluckiest nightmare.

name: Norr part II: Will Walker
description: Shot, run and slow time or you'll die!

name: Flyland Wars: 3 Model Trains
description: A sci-fi flying person vs. robot battle game. This flyland is a model train layout writ large! But it has been made to be terribly lethal You have to destroy every danger to the refugees! (Come back again, click the arrow button and play trains! Game within the game!)

name: Detective Gman
description: Detective simulation. Top down open world exploration.

name: Code Geass: Genesic Re;Code
description: Code Geass Genesic Re;Code is the first mobile game based on the anime series Code Geass that was created by the Japanese animation studio SUNRISE.

name: Milf City
description: Milf City is a modern city where many races, cultures and lives of ordinary people are intertwined. And today you will be able to get to know more closely the life of 5 beautiful girls, residents of this city, who are radically different in their lifestyles and characters.

name: Roar of Revenge
description: A game that puts together Rastan's action with adventure elements inspired by Faxanadu. An old school tribute for every lover of 8-bit classics!

name: P0
description: Enjoy your last 7 days in the hospital, a peaceful and settled place where you can't really kill anyone. Explore with your feeble combat ability and find a way out. End with the truth of P0.

name: Booty Calls: Men At Work
description: Assist the successful entrepreneur Owen Thorn in organizing his work and get it on with the hottest guys of the city!

name: Pnevmo-Capsula: Domiki
description:
The action of the steampunk game "Pnevmo-Capsula: Domiki" takes place in Russia of the 70s.

The game opens the door to the history of parallel Russian reality, where society and technologies developed along the path of cultivating harsh mechanics. All houses are connected by a system of tiny rails along which you have to move in the form of a steampunk tiny capsule.

Search and activation of the hidden mechanisms such as springs, telephones and various incandescent lamps, passing traps, portals, mechanical mail boxes and other quests will show you the way to the end of the level.

All the action takes place in the setting of the harsh communist future dominated by bulky analog electronics.

name: Furry House
description: The protagonist of a furry house is a boy forced by some events to move in with his mother. Making things difficult is that the mother and sisters are of another species, not human beings but furry!

name: The Based Turnabout
description: Phoenix Wright faces his final case of his career before retirement, but a case involving the king of turnabouts is never so simple, is it?

name: Y
description: Sin descripción

name: Hyper Danganronpa Melancholy
description:
16 Students Trapped in a Killing Game?
But a story of dual academies, forming into one.
A story filled with students from dual academies being faced up into the same brim of ....Melancholy. Each student not only has a unique talent.. but a unique special secret each of them have...

name: Sonic Colors DX
description:
Sonic Colors HD/DX is a bundle of original modifications to the original (wii) Sonic Colors on a modified version of the Dolphin Emulator, with the goal of bringing the game up to modern graphics standards.
This mod aims to be more faithful to the original design than Sonic Colors: Ultimate, while containing fewer glitches.

name: Hardwork Simulator
description:
It was a normal day at work. But your text editor started to get pretty Unstable.

Hardwork Simulator is the perfect game for you to play at work, on the university computer, or any other time you just want to have fun! Play a game while everyone around you think you are working as hard as hell.

Sounds fun, right? But not everything will be fun. Angry stickmen try to unmask you while you smash your keyboard trying to reach the end of the document.
Kill Stickmen and keep the mouse pointers away from your text by dropping letters on them. But you have to be careful not to lose too many letters or you will face the Blue Screen of Death!

name: The Salatroisk Incident
description: 'The Salatroitsk Incident' is a short PSX-style horror game set in a fictional Russian city after a nuclear incident.

name: Zippy the Circle: Level 3 & Level 4
description: Sin descripción

name: II-III-V
description: You're recovering in a hospital when you hear a strange noise outside

name: Tactical Monsters: Strategy Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Les aventures de Fierot
description: Sin descripción

name: Polybius Invaders
description: Take on the Evil General Goo as he sends waves of Retro Space Invaders your way in this Action-Packed Arcade Shoot 'em up.

name: Escape From Planet Aelea
description: In this action-adventure game from DASA Studios, play as lone astronaut Jennifer Sousa as she evades deadly robots, solves puzzles to collects access keys, and uncover the secrets of outpost 3 to escape planet Aelea!

name: Super Otamatone
description: Basically you shoot red bois, that's it.

name: Last Days
description: The gods have blessed New Canaan for four hundred years, and everyone - including Sister Ginsetsu - thought it would go on forever, until the day Ginsetsu met the gods of New Canaan. Since then, the story between the maiden who calls herself a god, and the maiden who will become a god has begun.

name: Goose Goose Duck
description: Goose, goose, Duck? A game of social deduction where you and your fellow geese must work together to complete your mission. Keep an eye out for those malicious Mallards and other birds, who have infiltrated your team and will do anything to stop you.

name: Super Luigi 64
description: Sin descripción

name: The Life We've Chosen
description: A melancholy but hopeful visual novel about a person choosing how to deal with their demons, both inner and external.

name: Zedipede
description: Something is stirring in the mushroom patch! Zedipede is a fast-action arcade game complete with progressive difficulty, high-score table and attract mode. Can you repel wave after wave of attackers? It starts out simple enough but gradually becomes insane. Extra life every 4th level. 100% lightning-fast machine code for the 16K Sinclair ZX81. We think you won't find a better or more complete version of this arcade classic for the Zeddy! Sublime chaos and amazing arcade action for the price, You won't be disappointed. Order now!

name: Ode to the Odonata
description:
A quick semi-speedmap made for @Dragonfly's birthday! Inspired greatly by his "Order of the Odonata" map from a few years back.

Simply collect the three teal skulls to open the exit. Blind playthrough probably takes about 20 minutes.

name: Maybe Valentine's Day Isn't The Worst
description: A gay visual novel made by Dudebulge

name: LochNess
description:
In the great classics, the snake game became a must-have from 1998.
Take a dose of nostalgia and play as the famous loch Ness monster in this snake like!

name: FIFA 22
description: Port of FIFA 22 for PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC. This version doesn't have some of the new technologies employed in the next generation version.

name: The Legend of Doom
description: The Legend of Doom is a total conversion for DOOM that seeks to faithfully recreate the original NES world of Hyrule!

name: Up All Night: Rumination
description:
Years after the events of Up All Night, Nick Torres remains haunted by the ghosts of his past. Seeking help, or at least solace, he reaches out to licensed therapist Patricia Rathburn for guidance.

Much to her dismay, Nick's presence proves a harrowing reminder of Patricia's own inner demons... but can she see past her clouded judgement to help this troubled young man?

Unfortunately, therapy can't fix everything.

name: Limbo Line
description: Welcome to SSL, one of Limbo's many offices! Taking control of our protagonist, Nine, you must serve your sentence by taking on support calls from denizens of the multiverse.

name: Silver Thread
description: An exorcist that doubts the existence of ghost might sound contradictory but to Alicia Wilkershire, this is the right way to get closer to the truth. Her latest job sounded like another run-of-the-mill case and she greeted her client with her usual pessimism but is it, really?

name: Mystik Belle: Enchanted Edition
description: Welcome to Hagmore School of Magic! Step into the clogs of a freshman witch-in-training Belle MacFae, and explore ancient haunted castle, while solving inventory puzzles!

name: Robot Car War: Transform Battle Machines
description: City robot battle is raging on - take part in a full scaled robot invasion! Become a fighting robot and wreak havoc - defeat armies of shooting robots and humans alike. Fight your robotic battle your way - shoot, throw, transform and unleash your ultimate robot smash power in the battle of city robots!

name: Among the Monolyths
description: A short game about solving puzzles to heal.

name: Kohana
description:
Kohana is a short visual novel made in one month by Mushroomallow Studio for Spooktober VN Jam 2021 event.

"Once close, now far apart. What should be done to close the distance?"

Kohana, a Japanese confection store in a world where humans and youkai coexist together. Ren, the young confection maker and the owner of the store, has been continuously attacked by a fox-shaped shadow. He knows the perpetrator, yet did nothing to stop them. Once the store guardian, Komainu, has enough and swears that he will eliminate the attacker, Ren has to do whatever it takes to stop the bloodshed between the two people he holds dear, even if it costs him his own life.

Witness the relationship between two childhood friends and unravel the tragedy that pushed them apart.

name: Residentvania
description: A demake of "RE: Village", made in the style of 2D "Castlevania"

name: Microcosmum: Survival of Cells - Campaign Static
description: We are glad to present you with a new additional campaign consisting of 50 missions. In this campaign, all the organisms are static, which can help you to experience the gameplay in another way and apply new tactics. In the course of playing your organisms will get three skills.

name: Fuyu no Tsuma
description: Fuyu no Tsuma is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Dungescape!
description: Dungescape! is a casual, minimalist escape-room game in which players control Celeste, a young noblewoman who has been trapped in a series of mazes of ever-increasing size and complexity. More than 40 rooms await to challenge adventurers in this humble kickoff for solo-dev Autism Fanaticism Gaming!

name: Chess
description: "Chess" is a turn based combat game.

name: Turing Complete
description: In this challenging puzzle game, you build a computer from scratch and program it. It is a journey through the layers of abstractions of the computer. The game begins when you are abducted by aliens who are testing your intelligence, and from here a lighthearted sci-fi plot evolves.

name: Forbidden place
description: A zombie virus appeared in the spacecraft. Please collect the materials in the spacecraft and try to escape.

name: Mystery Swords
description: Mystery Swords is a survival game with RPG elements. Your village was attacked by evil orcs. To protect the inhabitants, you, as the best soldier, are sent to explore the forest, but the enemies were much closer than it seemed. Can you stop a whole horde of hostile orcs?

name: Gorge
description: Gorge is a first-person puzzle-platformer, where you use telekinesis and wall-running to solve challenging interconnected obstacle courses.

name: LEGO Mario 64
description: Lego Mario 64 is a ROMhack/mod of Super Mario 64, made to replicate the LEGO set based on the Nintendo 64 game. It has a small low poly Mario jumping on miniature versions of some Nintendo 64 stages, in search for five hidden Power Stars.

name: Star Fighter
description: Start Fighter is an arcade game about the battle of spaceships. Explore the space station, shoot down enemy ships with heavy laser cannons, and control a maneuverable battle starship or a giant cruiser.

name: Requiescat
description: Requiescat is a sci-fi RPG.

name: Mini Kart Racing
description: Mini Kart Racing, Race with cute cars!

name: City of Thugs
description: City of Thugs is a turn-based roguelite RPG, set in the modern world, where you'll have to fight your way through a city full of randomly generated thugs.

name: Tinkercore
description:
An rpg about collecting robots and upgrades!

This entire game and etc. was made in only 8 days!

name: StarbaseSim
description:
Operate the Starship space launch system and learn how to catch a rocket to understand what it takes to colonize Mars in this ever-evolving simulation of SpaceX Starbase Texas.

This is a physics sandbox where you can play around with Starbase devices. This is not a flight sim. There are some basic flying mechanics, but they are mainly intended to be able to catch the rockets with the chop sticks.

name: The Swarm is Coming
description: Sin descripción

name: Castle Defender Saga
description: Castle Defender Saga is a war simulation game where you must defeat the enemy base before it defeats you! Upgrade your tower, add extra archers and use buffs to gain the upper hand over your opponent. Strategically dispatch your army to confront the enemy and bring victory home! Can you become the ultimate Castle Defender?

name: L'Abbaye des Morts
description: L’Abbaye des Morts is a game originally created by Locomalito and Gryzor87 and released in September 2010. More than 10 years later, the game has finally been ported to the NES/Famicom by Parisoft Games.

name: R-Type
description: A PICO-8 port of Irem’s R-Type, featuring the 4 stages in a 32kb cart! (Similar to the PC-Engine port, with 4 in a 256kb hu-card.)

name: CarsFuckingDragons
description: This game has a character named cars --- and these are his adventures trying to bang some Dragons! I mean, you fight other enemies too!

name: Just A Mapset
description: J.A.M: Episode 1 is a Boom (-complevel 9) ﻿mapset, containing 11 (+1) maps, with heavy usage of DeHackEd (so mods are highly likely to break it). All difficulty settings are available and balanced for them, but this is intended for those who have beaten Plutonia on UV at least.

name: Literalism
description: Literalism is a 26-level Boom mapset that came to life as a community project hosted by Yours Truly. Running between July 22nd and August 22nd, 2021, the project employed a gimmick somewhat inspired by how speedmapping sessions often place a thematic restriction. Participating mappers were given a randomly generated map title to make maps inspired by. Maps were compiled into this mapset in order of submission, so the difficulty curve may be all over the place.

name: Funnelcake Apparitions
description: Spooky episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards. This month's project leads are joe-ilya and 40oz.

name: Deliver Us From Evil: Masquerade
description: Deliver Us From Evil: Masquerade is a short and sweet BL visual novel. Keldran and Ace are two centuries-long friends with benefits. What starts off as a fun haunted house trip soon turns sinister and If they cannot conquer their fears, they may find themselves wandering the halls forever.

name: Pokémon Throwback
description: Pokémon Throwback is a vanilla quality-of-life enhancement decompilation hack of Pokémon FireRed. Pokémon Throwback aims to add as many QoL features as possible from the more recent games while looking and feeling just like vanilla FireRed and maintaining compatibility with the official games. Features include: catching all 251 Pokémon of generations 1 & 2, reusable TMs, battle difficulty, decapitalization, and much more!

name: The Last Night of Alexisgrad
description:
The sky is dark. It is a time of mystery, change and struggle. It is a time of opportunity.

In this asymmetric, two-player piece of interactive fiction, you and your partner each take on the role of a leader of a great nation on the last night of a war. A war one side did not even know it was fighting. Will you play as the general of the King’s army, riding north to retake the lands that rebelled against the royal line hundreds of years ago? Or will you play the Dictator of the Republic, who finds herself abandoned in a city wholly unprepared for war, now apparently only able to decide what her last few hours will look like in the city that she loves?

Both have little doubt that the city of Alexisgrad will fall tonight. The question that both must ask is how it will fall.

name: 4x4 Archipelago
description: Adventure waits for you in a procedurally generated Archipelago! Discover strange new lands. Make a fortune from trading. Swing a Really Big Sword at a dragon. Fight wild beasts – or turn them into your allies. Meet the puffins (if you're really lucky). With dozens of possible enemies, quests, and items, no two visits to the Archipelago are the same.

name: The Libonotus Cup
description:
“You? Win the Libonotus Cup?” Sammy scoffs. “I'd be impressed if your ship even makes it to the starting line tomorrow morning, let alone Portobello.”

“Aye,” you say, “me ship may have taken a beating in that last raid, but I'll bet ye 500 doubloons I can still beat you to the finish line!”

You'd better get to it, the race starts at dawn and your ship isn't exactly seaworthy at the moment.

name: Sting
description:
Six bees. Five bags of groceries. A four-pound dumbbell. Three sailboats. One twin.

Sting is a puzzleless parser memoir about ordinary days and unexpected interruptions.

name: What Heart Heard Of, Ghost Guessed
description:
Margaret, are you grieving

Over Goldengrove unleaving…

Come home to Goldengrove, a beautiful old house haunted by a lost soul. Uncover the secrets of your tormented past in a tale of unrequited love, jealousy, violence, betrayal, and vengeance.

"What Heart Heard Of, Ghost Guessed" is a puzzle-driven, parser-based gothic horror story with a unique command set.

name: Sunday Night Suicide
description: One night on the town you're spending some time with your hot girlfriend when a certain rodent bumps into you. You're excited to see it's the one and only Mickey Mouse! But he seems more... down than usual. Eh, everyone has their off days. You offer him a song to cheer him up. Little do you know how much of a mistake that truly is...

name: Mega Man X Alpha
description: Mega Man X Alpha is a hard-type modification for Mega Man X by "myselfthethird" adding new challenges and difficulty-focused elements to the original Mega Man X game. It greatly expands the scope of the game with the addition of new modding tools that allow more radical redesign of the levels.

name: GB Corp.
description: GB Corp. is an incremental / idle game for the Game Boy, that rewards you for playing it on several console models. Hire consoles from the Game Boy line (Original GB, GB Pocket, GB Color and Super Game Boy), and they work for your "push-button" company. When you have earned enough money, you can hire more employees, and upgrade the ones you have so they bring back more income. Also, you must be careful of their power levels: change the batteries of your employees when they are empty!

name: Infinite Adventure
description:
The Abort/Retry/Fail team is proud to present the famously lost INFINITE ADVENTURE. This game is a visionary pioneer in procedural text generation, randomly generating rooms, maps, items, descriptions, and puzzles for a text adventure set in a Victorian mansion. INFINITE ADVENTURE was available for sale for only one month through a Spring 1987 shareware catalog published in Cleveland, Ohio.

An "interactive feelie" accompaniment to B.J. Best's game And Then You Come to a House Not Unlike the Previous One.

name: And Then You Come to a House Not Unlike the Previous One
description:
You haven't been over since she told you a month ago that she was moving to some small town in Wisconsin. But Riley is here, and the computer is here, and that's what matters for now. "Have you played the game yet?"

"You told me to wait to play it with you about a billion times," she says.

A work of interactive fiction by B.J. Best.

name: College Kings: Act III
description: Sex, girls, parties, and power. As a freshman at San Vallejo College, you have the whole world in front of you - but it’s up to you to take it. Will you let the next four years pass you by, or will you lead your fraternity to the crown and become campus royalty?

name: Bard's Gold: Complete Edition
description:
Bard's Gold is a challenging platformer that lets you explore strange worlds in a quest for a Goblin that stole your gold. Help Bard to overcome the dungeon's many dangerous perils and use your new-found treasures to improve your character and to buy new weapons and gear!

Bard’s Gold Complete Edition contains all the hidden Halloween levels in one physical exclusive PS Vita Edition.

name: Ascendshaft
description: Sin descripción

name: (O_O)
description: (O_O) is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame created by Kontena in RPG Maker 2000. You take the role of Suzutsuki, as she explores her dream worlds. Along the way, you can collect effects that alter her emotions.

name: A Paradox Between Worlds
description: It is the year 201X, and the Nebulaverse fandom is on fire. You are a teen online, and your safe place is about to be torn apart.

name: Tales of Misteria
description:
Halloween-themed murder mystery visual novel in the kooky town of Misteria.

When Kira and Ame return to their hometown of Misteria for their college break, it doesn't really take long for them to hear about a local's murder.

Kira wants nothing to do with this case, but when they learn about the circumstances of the murder being strangely similar to a storybook they once read as children... well, obviously they end up entangled with this damn mystery...!

name: Romancing Flesh
description:
Romancing Flesh is a kinetic visual novel with the style of classic Universal Monster films, and the body horror schlock of direct-to-video scary movies!

Through audio recordings, letters, photos, and film, discover what drove Charles Keating from being a normal college graduate, to a mad scientist whose passions drove him to unethical experimentation, self mutilation, and forbidden love .

name: Mario's New Earth
description: Mario's New Earth is a ROM hack/mod of Super Mario 64 created by PixelSM64, with 125 Stars.

name: RE:Solver
description: Step into the role as an investigator under the RE:Solver Agency, a new investigation unit designed to take a fresh look at complicated cases. With your skills and newly granted overreaching privileges, you can access numerous confidential records on essentially anyone.

name: Fallen London: A Crown of Thorns
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for November, 2021.

name: The Secret of Monkey Island: Recoded
description:
30 Years of Monkey Island 2: LeChuck's Revenge....
Monkey Island 2: LeChuck's Revenge turned thirty. The extraordinary second chapter of the series of "point and click" graphic adventures - born thanks to the intuition and the inimitable comic streak of Ron Gilbert, Dave Grossman and Tim Schafer (LucasArts), continues to thrill many nostalgic players even today.

To celebrate this important anniversary with great fanfare, Daniele Spadoni invite you play at a timeline never seen before, an adventure that will have no end.

name: Night Stalkers
description: Be the monster in Night Stalkers. A third person indie game where you choose one of 4 monsters to terrorize a village by hunting the locals. Over the course of your destruction you draw the attention of guards, heroes, and monster hunters to challenge you.

name: Sneezeman: Return to Planet Sneeze
description: Introducing a new type of hero for the pandemic age! Platforming fun with hand drawn graphics from irreverent comedic powerhouse 'Modern Toss'! Avoid the chaotic sneeze cloud, out manoeuvre goose-stepping bad guys and navigate giant virus spores. Can you Escape from Planet Sneeze?!

name: Halloween Candy Break 2
description: Halloween Candy Break 2 is an arcade game that lets the user knock out Halloween Candy items with a unique Candy paddle and Pumpkin ball. Unique Animated levels, Mini-Bosses and Powerups to collect as you progress through the levels. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Armis
description: We invite adventurers to the world of Armis, a fantastic mobile MMORPG with a different dimension to enjoy in 3D high definition!

name: Train Crew
description: A train driving simulation game created by Japanese developer Mizotsuki Rail.

name: Dufe: Masquerade
description: A villainous duo deal with the most frightening thing they have ever faced: their feelings

name: Waccha PriMagi!
description: Waccha PriMagi! is a Japanese arcade game made to replace the Kiratto Pri-Chan arcade machines across Japan. It is an amusement game that is rhythm-based.

name: Second Puberty
description: An album of seven short games about feelings.

name: Jelly Party: Fire
description: A refreshing and fun shooting game, you only need to aim and shoot the tiles flying in all directions. Enjoy shooting in relaxing music!

name: Leisure Suit Larry: Wet Dreams Saga Bundle
description: Get the full "Wet Dreams"-Saga experience with this Leisure Suit Larry Bundle.

name: Treasure of Cutuma 3rd: Call of Guru
description: The game is a free add-on for the base game. This game is made using the GAMEGURU, FPS engine. An ambitious work that challenges the limits of GAMEGURU.

name: Holiday Mosaics: Halloween Puzzles
description: Holiday Mosaics: Halloween Puzzles – enjoy 120 puzzles made from colorful and breathtaking photos

name: Fishing Frenzy
description: Fishing Frenzy is a very interesting fishing game! You have to fight for prey, catch fish, blow up mad sharks and seahorses, collect stellar fish and shells, catch bubbles and bombs, worms, treasures, watches and gifts.

name: Impulse
description: Picture a mash-up of Super Meat Boy and Lunar Lander. Or N+ meets Asteroids. That’s Impulse.

name: Dark Light
description: Dark Light is a single-player 3D puzzle game. Levels present physical obstacles that must be conquered by moving beams of light that create solid platforms, allowing the player to maneuverer themselves towards the exit.

name: Touhou Monster TD
description: Easy to learn but hard to master, Touhou Monster TD is a unique Tower defense Game. Control your character, level up and unlock tower skills and character talents, use your wisdom to defeat incoming enemies. Travel the Gensokyo, find out why the "Incident" happened this time.

name: Chronicles of Etia: A Samhain Story
description: Episode one of a four-part prequel. A story of magic, mayhem and fairies. A perfect game to get into the Halloween spirit. If you enjoy RPGs from the SNES period then this may be the game for you, as my big inspirations for the game were Lufia and Breath of Fire.

name: Animal Cafe
description: Luna has been working too hard, fortunately as she finishes up each night she manages to find her way to a hidden out of the way cafe, one where the gals all dress up like different animals. It could be a place for dreams to come true, or just for Luna to blow off some steam and relax each night.

name: UFO Checkers
description: A classic game of checkers to play with your friends. Turn-based and themed after an alien invasion.

name: The Prisoner of the Night
description: The Prisoner of the Night is a single-player platforming game with a wide range of scenarios, where the lovely girl Nartide must survive terrible monsters and deadly traps in the darkest, scariest night of her life.

name: Pussy 4
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: My Inner Darkness is a Hot Anime Girl!
description: My Inner Darkness Is A Hot Anime Girl! is a 3D turn-based RPG game featuring surreal enemy designs and dream-like locations, packed into a gripping story about overcoming the thoughts and memories you would rather not have but can't stop thinking about. You know, the ones that keep you up at night.

name: Oh, Dungeon Master
description: Oh, Dungeon Master is a dungeon simulator, with elements of a roguelike game. Explore the intricate underground mazes and dense forests to exterminate monsters and find all the pictures!

name: Iris Covenant: Song of the Forgotten Heroes
description: Old School RPG.You accepted a request to save the world from a religious group called Levin Relief Society. Ancient mysteries and unknown dangers are waiting for you ahead the journey.

name: Magical Inspector Momo
description: Magical inspector Momo uncovers the dirty secrets of adults! She must infiltrate without being discovered by anyone and without being caught in a trap!

name: Searching for objects in the forest
description: Searching for objects in the forest is a classic game in the genre of "I'm looking for". During the game, you will have to get acquainted and search various places.

name: Legends of Murder Collection
description: When a murder is committed under mysterious and supernatural circumstances, the Inspector arrives on the scene, ready to interrogate witnesses, decipher riddles, and fend off attackers seeking their next victim. Ready your spyglass and sword as you take on these two murder mystery RPGs.

name: Curving Over It with Evgeny Podoynikov
description: Overcome obstacles by throwing a ball, which is not as simple as it might seem.

name: Halloween Stories: Horror Movie - Collector's Edition
description: It’s Only a Movie... Right?

name: Kyle is Famous: Complete Edition
description: Take Control of Kyle in this Text-Based Adventure. Make decisions for Kyle that will affect every part of his day. Take Kyle's hand through 117 unique endings, each determined by what Kyle has done and who he has interacted with. He needs you. Be kind. Kyle just woke up and Kyle needs to prepare to conduct an interview with a very, very important guest on his show. Collect items, make choices, and solve mysteries. Kyle can swallow the fridge and Kyle can travel time and steal from the locals and dump lard on his neighbor and many, many other things that KYLE SHOULD NOT DO. Take Kyle's hand. Direct him. Tell him what he ABSOLUTELY SHOULD NOT DO. Confidently help Kyle. He needs you. Kyle has 117 endings but only one of them is the good, well-prepared ending that you are going to guide Kyle to. Who knows what would happen if you weren't there for him? Would he destroy the city? Gossip about his neighbor? Fight crime? Revive a dead loved one?

name: Sports & Adventure Pinball
description: Enjoy 6 games in one with the perfect reproduction of real pinball machines, with all kinds of graphic details and sounds. If you prefer, you can also purchase them separately in the Nintendo eShop.

name: Dear Agony Aunt
description: Congratulations! You're on your way to becoming a professional agony aunt! All you have to do now is get through the trial period. Respond to messages using a retro 2006 email client. The replies you send will determine whether you are hired or fired at the end of the week. Good luck!

name: Holiday Solitaire Easter
description: What has the Easter Bunny brought? Golden cards! Collect them all and complete 120 unique levels in the new Easter Solitaire!

name: Poly Puzzle: Furries 2
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal puzzle game with furries.

name: The Hero of Bangaona
description: The Hero of Bangaona is a 2D Side-scrolling Action game where you play as the Hero of Bangaona kingdom whose mission is to capture the enemy bases in order to rescue the Princess who got kidnapped by the soldiers of the Weins Territory.

name: Gold Miner
description: The Gold Miner is a puzzle game. The goal of the game is to collect all nuggets and jewels in the level and avoid barrels with gunpowder.Collect gems, score points, upgrade your equipment! Try to complete all 20 levels as soon as possible, will you succeed ?!

name: Ninja Express
description: ▲As a great ninja, after the combat mission is over, you need to protect your identity and collect necessary intelligence at the same time. For example, part-time as a courier. ▲You must quickly complete the client's entrustment, while avoiding the attention of the police.

name: Farmers' Market
description: Farmers’ Market is a strategy game which requires the farmer to harvest crops and sell them at the local market in a set amount of time. After each harvest, money is gained and improvements can be made on the farm to increase production.

name: Cologne 3D
description: Explore parts of Cologne like the historic Old Market in the old town and the Gottfried-Hagen-Street in Cologne-Kalk (the office of the developer!).

name: The Twins' Experiment
description: The Twins' Experiment is a platform adventure game. You play as Object 62473 who is called to discover his hidden brother in a dream world of his mind.

name: Língua
description: Follow Beto's adventure through the northeast of Brazil in this top-down adventure! Solve puzzles, battle to free animal spirits and finish quests to help a friend retrieve a valuable possession!

name: Love Flute
description: Play the piano, play the flute, and enjoy a ghost story as you use the profits from your street performances to buy new instruments and furniture! Let's shoot for fame and fortune!

name: Flesh, Blood, & Concrete
description:
An RPG Maker horror game about a normal apartment building.
-
Content warnings: meat and disembodied gore, general horror elements, an allusion to suicide, and some existential dread.

name: Manasis Refrain
description: Manasis Refrain is a 3D anime adventure-RPG set in a colorful fantasy world filled with equal measures mana and magic. Determined to combat the Dark Lord and his dastardly forces, civilization has established schools to specially train and educate promising young pupils. You are one such student on their first day at the academy - don't be late!

name: The Trials
description: Use three challenging skills including moving between worlds, teleporting and time manipulation to discover seven main areas in The Trials island and solve over 30 side puzzles to collect gemstone to unlock new areas on the island.

name: Somni
description: Identify and fight back against ghosts and cryptid terrors. Somni is VR and Desktop Compatible. Identify the threat at hand and perform the proper ritual to purify it either alone or with your friends. Fend off your paranormal nightmares by investigating events and performing rituals to banish the entity for good.

name: Axiom Verge 1 & 2 Double Pack
description:
Axiom Verge 1:

This is the action-adventure you've been waiting decades for. After a lab accident, a scientist awakens in a mysterious, alien world. Is this a distant planet? The far future? Or a complex virtual-reality computer simulation?

Plumb the recesses of a large, labyrinthine world in order to learn its secrets and uncover your role within it.

Discover tons of weapons, items, and abilities, each with their own unique behaviors and usage. You'll need your wits to find them all.

Combat bizarre biomechanoid constructs, the deadly fallout of an ancient war, and the demons of your own psyche.

And finally, break the game itself by using glitches to corrupt foes and solve puzzles in the environment.

Axiom Verge 2:

You may have played Axiom Verge, or heard it referenced as a benchmark for indie action-exploration games. This long awaited sequel expands on the universe with completely new characters, abilities, and gameplay.

Indra, the billionaire behind the worldwide Globe 3 conglomerate, heads to Antarctica to investigate the disappearance of her daughter, but ultimately finds herself in entirely different reality, infected by parasitic machines that both aid and confound her. Where is she? Who is the mysterious person goading her from the other end of the computer terminal?

Explore an alternate Earth-like world, replete with the ruins of an ancient, high-tech civilization. Hack machines. Battle monsters. Use your remote drone to enter the Breach, a parallel but connected reality that is filled with its own dangers. You’ll want to search every inch for the hidden items and upgrades you need to survive.

This bundle has been rated E10 to T.

name: Misty Hollow
description: Misty Hollow is a monster-themed visual novel that focuses on love, friendship, and mental health.

name: Charlie: The Legend
description: Equip yourself with the best weapons and get ready to face your worst fears... Charlie: The Legend aspires to become a must have for all those who enjoy multiplayer horror games. Charlie is an asymmetrical multiplayer horror video game in which 4 Survivors must face a diabolical doll possessed by a demon. It's up to you! Play as Charlie and defeat the other players or take on Charlie as a survivor.

name: Jeebo & Jerbo vs. Life
description: An indie Metroidvania/JRPG that is heavily story-based about a goo creature who hates his job and his lazy cousin

name: Doom & Destiny Worlds: Survival of the Nerdiest
description: Survival of the Nerdiest is the first premium DLC for Doom & Destiny Worlds. It features the "Survival" modifier, which will challenge you with new game-play mechanics like hunger, thirst, sleep and thermal comfort.

name: Immersys
description: Immersys is a Multiplayer Immersive NFT Metaverse. Players can participating in a vast economy built on the WAX Blockchain. Immersys has is own cryptocurrency named FATE which can be earned through gameplay. The game's equipment, land, and resources are all Non-Fungible Tokens which can be verified on the blockchain.

name: Death Trials
description: Before you know it, you've woken up in a SURVIVAL HORROR GAME. Total darkness. It feels like you're in a rusty metal cage, which hangs in mid air. There's a small light against the wall twenty feet away, but you can't get out. Just as your eyes adjust, the cage door slowly opens... You jump from the cage... three feet below to the floor... and into the darkness...

name: Variables 2
description: After two years of precipitation, we re-made this variable sequel after thinking about it! Variable 2 is a unique stand-alone tower defense game. We have enriched the building and elements of tower defense, and the experience in the game can be changed according to your ideas!

name: Escape Hospital
description: “My IV stings…who can I trust?” Created independently by Morning Drizzle M.D., artist behind the acclaimed Iatrophobia Facebook page, this game features a brand new storyline with familiar characters and art from the comic.

name: Lost and Found - What if I Come and Find It
description: The definitive precarious employment simulator! Resolve the ridiculously ambiguous notes from your clients before the end of your looooong working day to earn a starvation salary! If you make any mistakes… it will be deducted from your salary…

name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2022
description: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2022 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite football team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents right down to creating and calling your own plays to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: Minimal Crypt
description: Discover the simple yet intricate rules of Minimal Crypt through 50+ handcrafted puzzling levels of ever increasing difficulty! Create your own levels in the in-game editor and share them with the community to push the experience further.

name: Gris: Collector's Edition
Ultimate Chicken Horse: A-Neigh-Versary Edition
description:
Ultimate Chicken Horse is a party platformer where you and your friends build the level as you play, placing deadly traps before trying to reach the end of the level. If you can make it but your friends can't, you score points! Play online or locally with your animal buddies and experiment with a wide variety of platforms to find new ways to mess with your friends.

A-Neigh-Versary Edition includes:

- Base Game
- Chicken Keyring
- Ultimate Chicken Horse Compendium booklet
- Digital Soundtrack Code

name: Knife to Meet You
description: A knife throwing game with total throw-control (spinning, power, direction), real physics simulation, object destruction (slicing, piercing, pinning), competitive leaderboards and replay system.

name: Ekstase
description: Amazing techno beats and beautiful visuals set the stage for a game that honors the long forgotten falling block puzzle genre. Ekstase is easy to pick up and sink many hours into. With both classic and new game modes, there is something here for both the casual and the hardcore puzzle game player.

name: The Evolving World: Catalyst Wake
description: After three apocalyptic events known as the "Catalysts" devastated the world, what remains of humanity must fight for peace if they are to survive.

name: Phoenix Point: Behemoth Edition
description: Phoenix Point: Behemoth Edition includes the base game, plus four downloadable content expansions titled, “Blood and Titanium,” “Legacy of the Ancients,” “Festering Skies,” and “Corrupted Horizons.”

name: Effie: Galand's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: FIFA 22: Legacy Edition
description: Powered by Football, FIFA 22 brings the game even closer to the real thing with fundamental gameplay advances and a new season of innovation across every mode.

name: FIFA 22
description: Powered by Football, FIFA 22 brings the game even closer to the real thing with fundamental gameplay advances and a new season of innovation across every mode. Play with 17,000+ players, over 700 teams in 90+ stadiums and more than 30 leagues from all over the globe.

name: Welcome Back
description: You died! Reincarnate in 5 animals to prove GOD You are worthy of returning to the world in this spiritual adventure. A short, experimental and multi-genre game with 5 gameplay styles, each with its own unique mechanics.

name: Touhou Mystia's Izakaya
description:
This is a brand new izakaya simulation gameplay.
The young night sparrow and her BBQ has become a welcome sight in Gensokyo with her hard work and flourishing business-that is, until one day, that fateful enemy showed up whom broke her dream. Start from scratch, loaded with dept, it's all or nothing on today's cooking.

name: Friki
description: Friki is an online co-op investigative horror. Solve the reasons why these ghosts have died, determine a ghost type, and if you are brave enough, exorcise the ghost.

name: Comet
description: Wen Jing (the player), who has just recovered from a serious illness, invites his elder brother Hu Feng, the second child Ye Fei, and the young Gu Qian to visit the house.

name: 13 Wood St
description: 13 Wood St is a story-based horror game with both psychological and jumpscare elements.

name: Scoober Splat!
description: A chaotic action party game where you chase your friends! Pick your Goober and kill Scoobers, who are defending themselves with powerups. No betrayals or meetings, just running and screaming! With a free-to-play browser demo, easily invite your friends to join a game, no downloads required!

name: Clan of Death
description: Clan of death is a multiplayer traitor game, designed for having a lot of fun with your friends. A group of vikings has to complete some quests in a undead infested fjord. One of the vikings is a shape shifted cultist that rules over the undead and wants to sabotage the vikings quest.

name: Marcella Moon: Curse of the Black Cat
description: Play as amateur sleuth Marcella Moon to investigate a cursed black cat statue that has been terrorizing a local theater.

name: Shera and the 40 Thieves
description: A NES Puzzle Platformer from Crazygrouptrio, more commonly known for their Game music arrangements.

name: Vlorp
description: Vlorp is a multiplayer hoverkart collector combat racing adventure game.

name: Sign of Silence
description: Sign of Silence is a 4-player cooperative horror game set in dreadful outskirts of Danville town. Whether you will escape the place or stay here forever depends on cautious and coordinated actions of the whole team!

name: Space Merchant
description: Based off the original Merchant RPG, a new Idle RPG space exploration experience!

name: The Others
description: "Story of this game is under development" Psychological Sci-Fi Horror/puzzle game about a Father who becomes part of a time loop, tries everything to get his daughter back when she disappear after a mysterious accident.

name: Legion TD 2
description: An infinitely replayable multiplayer and single-player tower defense. Defend against waves of enemies and destroy the enemy's king before they destroy yours. Legion TD 2 is a one-of-a-kind game of tactics, teamwork, and prediction. Party as 1-8 players.

name: Lucas Mendoza: Amateur Detective
description: Sin descripción

name: Hustle Quest: Historia of Urth
description:
We play games to escape from the harsh mundanities of life. In Hustle Quest you do the exact opposite. Hustle Quest is a comedy RPG with a heavy focus on dialogue and exploration as opposed to combat.

When a Cat Girl named Mia drinks too much on her birthday, she ends up selling a powerful magical artifact needed to defend the town against an oncoming threat. Worse, the person she sold the artifact to wants to take over the town. Now Mia must recover the artifact before it's too late! But first, she has some errands to run.

Explore a town filled with unique quests, multiple secrets and memorable characters. Make choices that determine how quests play out and your overall chance of success against the final boss. Discover what happens when a Cat Girl drinks too much.

name: Grim Borough
description: You play as Corporal Alexei, who has received a seek-and-destroy mission from HQ to wipe out one of the last Timestriker platoons in existence.

name: Cursed Land
description: Explore a castle overrun with enemies, an abandoned mine that's seen better days, survive a village where the locals have turned, and make your way onto a Timestriker ship.

name: Pic-Man
description: A Pac-Man clone for PICO-8. You control Pic and your goal is to eat all pills to win the maze.

name: Classic Internet Scary Maze Game: Game Boy Edition
description: An unofficial Game Boy demake of The Maze.

name: Mornings with Java
description:
After recently moving in, Chronos receives much needed help from his neighbour Java. As thanks, he starts spending the mornings with him. Together they learn more about each other and end up falling in love.

MORNINGS WITH JAVA is a visual novel/point and click game created in Ren'Py. Help Chronos make drinks for Java as they spend the mornings with each other.

name: The Long Trek Back Home
description: Meant to be an immediate follow-up to the story of Doom II, it features maps that are heavily inspired by their original counterparts, but with a reversed progression. The player begins at the destroyed Icon of Sin site and retraces their steps through the Hell levels, city levels and finally the starport levels, while facing increasingly heavy demonic opposition and changed, mostly destroyed and twisted architecture heavily reminiscent of the original layouts.

name: Blue Fire: Void of Sorrows
description:
The Void of Sorrow DLC is an end-game content expansion for Blue Fire that includes:

2 new Areas: the Void Gate, a secret wing of the Fire Keep; and the Sealed Land, a forgotten place hidden away for ages.
16 new mind-blowing Voids which will have you prove your limit
1 new epic boss fight where you'll uncover an unbelievable truth
Several hours of new gameplay
Exclusive tunics, swords and a new NPC
Lore expansion & cutscenes

name: Shock Lobster
description:
Zip and zap your way to the top in this aquaventure!

Shock Lobster is a Game Boy ROM designed to run on the original Game Boy handheld video game system using a flash cartridge. It should also play well on most emulators.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Danmaku Kentei Shiken - Ketsui-Hen
description:
Part of CAVE's line of mobile bullet dodging tests. Released for DoJa and J2ME mobile devices, then re-released for Nintendo Switch.

Based on the arcade game Ketsui: Kizuna Jigoku Tachi, it weaves the stages and bosses from the original into an endless boss rush. The farther a player gets, the harder the game becomes. Players are challenged to survive as long as possible while racking up a high score. Players are able to pick from the original game's ships.

When you think of CAVE's shooting games, you think of "danmaku". But how good are you really? The second installment of "Danmaku Certification Death Test" will answer that question.

This "Danmaku Certification Death Test" is a shooting game that assesses your ability to deal with danmaku by fighting opponents that get stronger with each defeat.

In this latest installment, "Ketsui Edition", the vicious weapons from "Ketsui: Kizuna Jogoku Tachi" will stand in your way.

In addition to being evaluated by rank in the game, this game also supports online rankings,
so you can further hone your skills by competing with users from all over the world.
Those heading to hell on earth, behold the essence of danmaku.

name: Hank'n Spank
description:
Hank is starting his hunt in the haunted mansion and he has to exterminate all the ghosts!
Walk throughout the mansion hunting these monsters.

name: Minecraft Dungeons Arcade
description: Minecraft Dungeons Arcade is a 1-4 player co-op arcade machine adaptation of the Minecraft Dungeons game. For each paid play, the game issues a reusable physical card that can be scanned at the arcade machine for equipment and power-ups.

name: The Case of the Serialized Killer
description:
When a popular illustrator is found dead, disgraced demonologist Harold Ludicael is hired to summon her ghost. But he’s hiding a secret:

Ghosts are as fake as all the other lies coming out of Ludicael's mouth.

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer: Lotus Labyrinth R - Wily Beast and Weakest Creature Friends
description: This DLC adds new team members from Touhou: Wily Beast and Weakest Creature.

name: City Air Battle
description: City Air Battle is an arcade style flight racing and shooting game. In the game, you can not only fly all kinds of stunts between skyscrapers, but also compete and fight fiercely with your opponents, and constantly challenge your flight and shooting skills in fast-paced and high-intensity confrontation.

name: Mistral
description: Mistral is a 3D action roguelike game where you journey through a fantasy world. Collect relics to boost your powers, and use your weapons & spells to defeat the force of evil.

name: Waga Himegimi ni Eikan o
description: The protagonist, Shaon who grew up in a remote area, taught a technique called Tenken by his teacher. The teacher hopes that Shaon will pass on his abilities to his descendants. When he is old enough, he needs to left his home to find a bride. How you live your life, who will you marry? It all depends on your choice.

name: Margareta
description: Margareta is a full length psychological-horror based game, although the game fundamentally relies on both psychological-horror and the comedy genre, it's a fun game that will leave you trembling in fear. While trying to escape, you must finding the right path, solve puzzles and hide from the frightening entity.

name: Duvet
description: Duvet is a short adventure-puzzle game made in Unity by Jacaranda Studio about a dystopical world with militarized magical girls.

name: Neverboard
description:
Games for friends in new realities.

Hang out and play board games in a whole new way! Filled with a growing list of easy-to-pick-up 2-4 player games and delightful interactions, there is something for everyone to discover.

name: ArtFormer: Ancient Stories
description:
ArtFormer is a story-driven cinematic platformer with RPG elements. This Indie game project consists of four challenging story chapters each with a unique hero, different gameplay, and original art style based on existing fragments of human history: Cave paintings, Egyptian papyrus, Greek pottery, and Roman mosaic.

The characters and stories seen through the eyes of ancient artists from different times will come to life before your eyes. Four chapters of ArtFormer each with a unique hero, storyline, and new mechanics!

This isn't just a humble tribute to the cinematic platformers (Prince of Persia, Another World, Oddworld, Flashback...), but a proud continuation of their gaming legacies.

ArtFormer's game controls are specially designed and adapted to enable gamers with reduced mobility or other impairment to one upper limb. Yes, this means that the game can be controlled with one hand. However, you cannot expect a "standard" control setup, but a slightly different control scheme than that used by other similar games. Please bear that in mind while playing.

name: Heliopedia
description:
A fictional universe sandbox/exploration game.

Collect materials, terraform planets and discover new species to add to your encyclopedia. Make beautiful microcosms of ocean planets, grass plains and rain forests, or breed destruction with wildfires, volcanoes, and lightning storms. What kind of worlds will you make?

name: Wargame: Red Dragon - Nation Pack: South Africa
description: Get back into the fight with South Africa's unique Cold War arsenal. Discover nearly 90 new units - all historically accurate and fully voiced - from Bokkop infantry to Buffel APCs, G6 Renoster wheeled artillery, and Rooivalk attack helicopters.

name: Coffee Noir: Business Detective Game
description: A unique combination of a business management game and detective novel with elegant graphics in a noir comic-book art style. Experience an advanced business management simulation along with intriguing story set in alternative future of Neo-London.

name: Cosmic Cube
description: This is a refreshing horizontal version of the act game, which is still under production and has completed a simple trial version of the first level. It combines combo skills, perfect defense upgrade and other elements. What you want to see will be updated later

name: Rebirth: Beware of Mr.Wang
description: This is a plot-oriented interactive puzzle game. The gameplay uses mouse clicks or drag-and-drop methods to promote the development of the plot. The game tells the story of an ordinary young man who pursues love, grows up in the process of hard work, and finally reaps friendship and love.

name: Zombies Everywhere 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Wordding
description: Fill in the blanks in this quick based trivia game!

name: 3D Double Dealing Character
description: 3DHzc is a free view shooting game, you will play Hakurei ReiMu,Kirisame Marisa,Izayoi Sakuya to defeat the boss

name: Circe's revenge
description: Circe's revenge is a transformative erotic RPG game for adults. The protagonist is sexually transformed into a pig by the witch Circe. Can you survive 30 days and escape the transformation?

name: Neko Hentai Girl
description: Only in this game you get AAA-quality nude pictures, arousing female moans, beautiful design with animation, relaxing music, gallery, zoom, cheat and 100 achievements

name: Cute Girl 2
description: Cute Girl 2 is the second part of a mesmerising hentai puzzle game that can lift your spirits. More levels, more girls for your collection. Hot art and juicy girls will give you fun and a real treat.

name: Fantasy Sliding Puzzle 3
description: Challenging sliding puzzles with various levels of difficulty, featuring epic fantasy female characters in warrior outfits.

name: Cotton 2: Saturn Tribute
description: Set in the Pumpkin Kingdom which has lost its national treasure—the "Bluewater Willow," this brain-stimulating action-shooter follows Cotton, a witch with the biggest appetite in the universe, and Appli, the most tomboyish girl in the royal family. This is the fourth installment in the fantasy shooting game series featuring Cotton, one of SUCCESS's most popular characters. This masterpiece of the past is given new life using the specially-developed "Zebra Engine." The new features included such as game rewind, slow mode, and quick save greatly improve ease of play. Online rankings have also been added!

name: Cotton Boomerang: Saturn Tribute
description: There are team battles this time! Take full advantage of all the amplified action and push forward! Set in the Pumpkin Kingdom which has lost its national treasure—the "Bluewater Willow," this brain-stimulating action-shooter follows Cotton, a witch with the biggest appetite in the universe, and Appli, the most tomboyish girl in the royal family. This is the fifth installment in the fantasy shooting game series featuring Cotton, one of SUCCESS's most popular characters. This masterpiece of the past is given new life using the specially-developed "Zebra Engine." The new features included such as game rewind, slow mode, and quick save greatly improve ease of play. Online rankings have also been added!

name: Namaiki Dark Elf Sisters
description: The half-human, half-elf Ober grew up discriminated against by his own family due to his mixed heritage, but one day a prophecy flips that life upside down. Now declared as the future head of his family, the sisters that once mistreated him are ordered to serve him and bear his children.

name: One Pixel TWB
description: 2D platform game with minimalist pixel art graphics, create platforms and shoot a lot to defeat several bosses that have invaded your castle and are trying to destroy your city.

name: Smashing time
description: VR destruction simulation, destroy everything in the museum, the oval office, a restaurant or a simple flat ! Wreak havoc and let the devil out !

name: Yacht Dice
description: Yacht Dice is a classic dice game popular around the world, each player by throwing dice statistics score to carry on the game, the player with the highest score wins. Invite friends to play online, or compete against players from around the world.

name: Dinogotchi
description: Dinogotchi is a tamagotchi-like game featuring cute dinosaurs. Take care, evolve, have fun and give lots of love to your little jurassic friends!

name: Calluna
description: Calluna is a small adventure game about the Norwegian composer and violinist Ole Bull. In Calluna, you can play as Ole Bull in four independent adventures as young, old, rich, and poor. Walk the streets of Bergen, Paris, and Cairo in first-person and explore a semi-open world filled with interactive items, townspeople, and collectibles. Solve quests based on historical events and follow Ole Bull’s dream of fame and glory.

name: Cade Prime
description: Cade Prime is the DoD's most advanced android. Bad Dudes have placed him inside of the Mainframe. Can You help him solve challenging puzzles in order to escape ?

name: Toadomination
description: Toadomination is a rogulite, bullethell, looter shooter game that takes you into an ancient confrontation that lasts more than a decade, in a battle between a toad and a viper. Equip yourself with the most powerful weapon, collect capital and meet face to face with the sworn enemy.

name: Planet Hotpot
description: Planet Hotpot is a VR shooter where you run around shooting aliens as an employee of a galactic megacorporation to recover corporate espionage left all over the world by your bungling coworker.

name: Colours and Symbols
description: Colours and symbols is a single-player puzzle-solving game. Slide the coloured symbols around and match the sequence provided.

name: Viva Games Collection
description:
Two great games from Viva Games in one pack!

Immortal Legacy: The Jade Cipher: Delve deep into the origins of a sinister Chinese legend and unearth the secrets of an island's forgotten past in this pulse-pounding adventure.

Your Toy: Do you rememver your childhood toy? Where are they? They were your friend, ever, but can you imagine how they will be your nightmare for now? A popular 3D first person puzzle adventure game is now on sale!

name: AlphaLink
description: AlphaLink is a new multiplayer shooter based off the Kova sci-fi back story. Compete in local or online PVP matches, talk to NPCs in the hub about lore and upcoming events, customize your character, and take part in the global faction leaderboard! AlphaLink will continuously live with new updates giving fresh new features!

name: SGC: Short Games Collection #1
description:
Time is running short but you still want to play meaningful games that leave you with a sense of accomplishment. Well, look no further! The SGC - Short Games Collection has gathered five amazing gaming experiences that you can play through from start to finish and still have time to enjoy other fine things in life.

Encased in a beautiful 3D menu environment created originally for the SGC you will find: The Good Time Garden; Swallow the Sea; A Game Literally About Doing Your Taxes; Ghostein; and Uranus. These acclaimed gems are available on Nintendo Switch for the very first time. Experience the most psychedelic and thought provoking games anytime and anywhere.

name: ExZeus: The Complete Collection
description: Hostile alien forces have set their sights on Earth and will stop at nothing to wipe our civilization from existence. The invaders seek to use their advanced technology to annihilate humanity, but they weren’t expecting the people of Earth to counter with sophisticated technology of our own. Enter Project ExZeus, humanity’s last and best defense to repel the otherworldly menace and restore peace to our little blue planet using ultra high tech fighting robots! Take control of four different robots and blast those aliens back to where they came from in these action-focused high-flying 3D arcade style rail shooters! ExZeus In the year 2102 C.E. a massive, previously unknown asteroid entered Earth’s orbit and began unleashing waves of attacks on the planet, killing thousands of people every day and devastating human civilization. The lucky few who survived the initial onslaught managed to escape deep underground, narrowly preventing humanity’s extinction. The Governing Council ordered an immediate counter-attack using three experimental robots: Calista, Sophia, and Dynamis. With that, Operation ExZeus was born. Now, you must choose one of the three giant flying robots to take into battle against the invading forces of Diadora. Soar through the skies, blast away enemies, and reclaim Earth for its people! ExZeus 2 After a century of peace, Operation ExZeus and the defeat of Diadora are but a distant memory for the people of Earth. However, the peace was not to last. A new menace has emerged from deep space in the form of five mysterious pods, each one a weapon of mass…

name: Ludo XXL
description: This classic game par excellence has brought young and old together for generations. The much-loved original, with its child-friendly rules and thrilling luck of the dice is now finally available for Nintendo Switch. It’s great fun for the whole family – full of both laughter and frustration!

name: MMC Kenken: The World's Most Exciting Math and Logic Puzzle
description:
The hit teaching material that has sold over 2.5 million copies has been turned into game software as "Daizen"! A total of 3,000 math puzzles for children and adults to learn while having fun. There are two modes of play. One puzzle per day In this mode, you can challenge a scored puzzle only once a day. You can also get a certificate according to your total points for a month. You can also get a certificate depending on your total points for a month. Aim for a high score and keep challenging every day. Anytime Lesson In this mode, you can play puzzles at any time and for as long as you like.

There are five types of puzzles: "addition," "multiplication/subtraction," "multiplication," "multiplication/division," and "four rules. Keep challenging yourself with puzzles that gradually get more difficult. From elementary and junior high school students in compulsory education to adults who want to exercise their brains, please enjoy this math puzzle game that can be played over and over again!

name: Arcade Archives: Typhoon Gal
description: Typhoon Gal is an action game released by Taito in 1985. Players control martial-arts challenger Yuki as she faces off with the toughest opponents at rival martial arts schools. Yuki can use both major and minor techniques. Weaken enemies with minor techniques, then take them down with a single major technique!

name: The Card Battle: Eternal Destiny
description: The Card Battle: Eternal Destiny is an epic card game inspired by myths and legends, featuring 600+ cards with delightful animation! Build your own deck with various cards, and beat enemies with high-level strategy combining evolutions, abilities, and attributes.

name: Rogue Lords: Blood Moon Edition
description:
The Blood Moon edition includes:
- The Game and the Supporter Pack
- Digital Artbook
- Original Soundtrack
- Moonlight set.

name: Gutting Goblins!
description: A top-down point and click dungeon-slaughterhouse where you slay goblins, break stuff and collect gold for score. explore a lived-in dungeon with heavy metal to keep you playing for anywhere between fifteen minutes to an hour at a time.

name: Puzzle Art: Dogs
description: Minimalist, relaxing, picture logic, art - puzzle game with dogs.

name: Junkyard Fury
description: You appear in what seems to be an abandoned Junkyard, you don't quite know how you got there... But your not alone. Try to escape the Junkyard of killer cars, if you can.

name: Bridge of Dawn
description: Bridge of Dawn is a free, open-sourced 3D arcade/racing style game for one or two players. Follow the story of Vulpes the Fox as he rushes to catch the sun and find out the secret to everlasting life in this lighthearted and fun game for all ages.

name: Memory Booster
description: Memory Booster – is a incremental puzzle game. Memorize tiles, upgrade stats to progress easier and train your brain!

name: Doom Work
description: In this atypical game, your role is to prevent the working robots from finishing construction to save the forest!

name: Super Grave Snatchers
description: Use pixelated necromancy to smash villages, scare townsfolk, and generally cause a ruckus.

name: Pool Puzzles
description: Pool Puzzles puts you into the ultimate pool battle. Do you have what it takes to fulfill every level’s requirement? Each game is very intense and fun, and you get to test as well as improve your pool experience every time. That’s what really makes it stand out above the rest, so you have to give it a try right away. With Pool Puzzles, every level is exciting since you have to fulfill new challenges. You can buy a variety of skins with the coins you acquire from your gameplay. So there’s always a need to improve your skills and become even better than before. Check out the ultimate pool game with some great challenges!

name: Simple Dominoes
description: Simple Dominoes offers you the opportunity to play dominoes and have fun for a change. We created Simple Dominoes with a single premise, to help show off your prowess while pushing the boundaries and the gameplay to the next level. It really is one of the most exciting and rewarding ways to play dominoes. We follow the standard game rules, and it’s an experience suitable for newcomers and experts alike. If you love dominoes, you always want to test your prowess either against a great AI. Here you get to have that, and it’s a really fun experience to try out! Features: 4 game modes 300 levels in puzzle mode Simple, fun dominoes gameplay Test your prowess and see if you can win

name: Colsword
description: Logic puzzle game in which you have to paint the cubes in the desired sequence using your colored magic swords.

name: eFootball 2022
description: eFootball 2022 is a football simulation game developed and published by Konami. Released in September 2021, it marks a significant shift in the Pro Evolution Soccer (PES) series. Konami rebranded the franchise to eFootball and transitioned to a free-to-play model and a new engine, Unreal Engine.

name: Toree 2
description: Toree 2 is the sequel to Toree 3D. A bite-sized 3D Platformer sequel with more focus on the things people enjoyed in the first game like fast gameplay, flow focused levels and cute costumes (two this time).

name: Spirit of Europe: Origins
description: An edutainment jRPG experience, spanning from ancient Greece to the 12th century European Renaissance, brimming with historically-accurate characters and events, experienced through two realms: of spirits, thoughts and emotions, and the material world.

name: Waifu Collector
description: Waifu Collector is a casual card-collecting gacha/loot-box simulator wrapped in a light visual novel and dating simulator framework, with nudity, sex, and full tradable and marketable Steam Inventory support! Designed to be played for a few minutes each day.
